amendment.description: To prevent and respond to terrorism and crime at or through ports.

action.text: Amendment SA 1365 ruled non-germane by the chair.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1365.
Amendment SA 1365 proposed by Senator Feinstein. (consideration: CR S9847-9848) To prevent and respond to terrorism and crime at or through ports.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1365 proposed by Senator Feinstein.
